channel.title: wavegens on kate's lab notebook
channel.description: Recent content in wavegens on kate's lab notebook

item.title: Quick look at the Hanmatek HO102S Portable Oscilloscope
item.description: I've recently been checking out a few options for inexpensive, DMM-form-factor oscilloscopes – mostly out of a desire to be able to work on hardware from anywhere with just my tiny laptop, a tiny projector, and some minimal equipment. Options like the Analog Discovery 2 are nice; but their readouts take up screen space; and they're often limited bandwidth – so I thought I'd try out a cheaper option in a DMM form factor.
